description: Forget the oven with this breezy no-bake lemon cheesecake slice that features swirls of tangy lemon curd. It's the ultimate afternoon pick-me-up.
name: No-Bake Lemon Cheesecake Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process cheese, milk and half the curd in a cleaned food processor until smooth. Pour mixture over biscuit base and spread out evenly. Dollop with remaining curd. Using a bamboo skewer, swirl to create a marbled effect. Refrigerate for 6 hours or overnight until set. Cut into 12 pieces. Serve.
